Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You grace others with your esteemed presence to inspire one another, expecting lavishing praise in return. Choose a creature within 30 feet that you are aware of and can perceive to offer a word of encouragement. This counts as preparing to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} for the next skill check or attack roll your target makes.

[[/act aid statistic=recitation]]{Aid (Recitation)}
